hiveArticle.title: My entry for the #monomad challenge : Peeping through edge
hiveArticle.body:
This image was taken in some 30 km from Bangalore. I went to trekking and found that sun is peeping through the cliff and I just have to hide it from it.

![IMG_0954.jpg](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmYdRmduWAfH2iDB5ArpeW3dsKzDAAiGjSieTTczF6cjPH/IMG_0954.jpg)

Camera | Canon 200 D
--- | ---
Lens |  EF-S 18-55mm
Aperture | F/7.1
Exposure | 1/320
ISO | 100
